isis.stitle: HYDRO-MAX™ BRAKE BOOSTER AND MASTER CYLINDER - INSTALL - BACKUP PUMP

svcproc.title: BACKUP PUMP
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 5 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Before installing the backup pump (Item 2) onto the Hydro-Max™ booster (Item 3), examine the sealing surfaces of both the backup pump and Hydro-Max™ booster housing for damage. If no damage exists, continue to the next step. If the sealing surface is damaged on either the backup pump and/or the Hydro-Max™ booster housing replace the unit with the damaged sealing surface.
Install the two new oval shaped O-rings (Item 4) into the grooves in the new Hydro-Max™ booster (Item 3). New oval shaped O-rings are supplied with the new backup pump.

Make sure the new oval shaped O-rings (Item 4) stay in the grooves of the new backup pump (Item 2) and position backup pump onto the Hydro-Max™ booster and install two hex flanged bolts (Item 1) securing them together. Tighten to 18 to 25 lbf-ft (24 to 34 N•m).

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 3 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position backup pump power lead (Item 14) over electrical stud (Item 12) and install hex nut (Item 13) and tighten. Tighten to 10 to 24 lbf-in (1.1 to 2.7 N•m).
Once the backup pump (Item 11) is installed onto the Hydro-Max™ booster (Item 3), fill the power steering pump reservoir to the proper level.
Connect battery ground cable and unblock the vehicle wheels.

svcproc.para: Start engine. Once the engine is running, the power steering pump will circulate power steering fluid through the system. This will automatically purge air from the Hydro-Max™ booster. Press on the brake pedal several times to make sure the pedal feels normal. With the engine off, press on the brake pedal several times to make sure the pedal feels normal in the backup pump mode. Check the interface, where the backup pump attaches to the Hydro-Max™ booster for leakage. Check power steering pump reservoir level, add power steering fluid, if necessary. Road test the vehicle to make sure the vehicle stops properly.
